result.text:
16 Kalas of Lord Krishna:🙏

1. Daya – Compassion 
2. Dhairya – Patience 
3. Kshama – Forgiveness 
4. Nyaya – Justice 
5. Nirapeksha – Impartiality 
6. Niraskata – Detachment 
7. Tapasya – Meditation and Spiritual Powers
8. Aparchitta – Invincibility 
9. Danasheel – Bestower of all wealth in the world and nature 
10. Saundaryamaya – Beauty Incarnate
11. Nrityajna – Best of Dancers 
12. Sangitajna – Best of Singers 
13. Neetiwadi – Embodiment of Honesty
14. Satyawadi – Truth Itself 
15. Sarvagnata – Perfect master of all arts, such as poetry, drama, painting etc 
16. Sarvaniyanta –Controller of All 

#Janmashtami #HappyJanmashtami

legacy.full_text: 🇮🇳🔋 The govt approves a Rs 3,760 crore Viability Gap Funding for creating battery energy storage system. This move will help reduce India's dependence on fossil fuels. The fund will be released in five tranches till 2030-31 and help in creation of 4,000 MW hours storage. ET

legacy.full_text: Kazi Asszad Hossain argues that while Bangladesh has forged several green partnerships with Western countries like the Netherlands and Denmark, it must also focus on South-South partnerships to reach its climate goals.

legacy.description: @StimsonCenter’s online policy platform featuring strategic analysis on South Asia. Editors: @mahikakhosla, and @avasudeva_87
